name: The Sixth Sentinel and the Dark Lord
name_original: The Sixth Sentinel and the Dark Lord
description:
The King has heard a rumor that a Dark Lord will soon arise in Cirrus Village, so he sends two of his most trusted men to kill it and retrieve its corpse. They set out to get to the bottom of things, but end up with a bit more than they bargained for...

The Sixth Sentinel and the Dark Lord is the third game in the RTF Series. You could probably enjoy it as a standalone game, but I do recommend playing the earlier games in the series, too, if you're interested in them after playing this. The tone is a little bit angstier this time around, but there's a good bit of the usual goofiness, too. Overall play time is around an hour and a half. I hope you'll enjoy it!

Made in around 18 days for the third (You)RPGM Game Jam. Please let me know if you find any gamebreaking bugs.

v1.1 - fixed a cutscene that caused the game to soft lock.

SPECIAL THANKS TO!!!!!!! Aekashics! For the use of their wonderful side view enemy graphics! I highly recommend checking their stuff out, it's great and it's plentiful. https://aekashics.itch.io/aekashics-librarium-librarium-static-batch-megapack
